title: Council Regulation (EC) No 751/95 of 31 March 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3365/94 allocating, for 1995, certain catch quotas between Member States for vessels fishing in Faroese waters
header:
COUNCIL REGULATION (EC) No 751/95 of 31 March 1995 amending Regulation (EC)  No 3365/94 allocating, for 1995, certain catch quotas between Member States for vessels fishing in  Faroese waters
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN UNION
main_body: In Annex I to Regulation (EC) No 3365/94, the figures relating to  mackerel in ICES division V  b are hereby replaced by those set out in the Annex to this  Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on 1 April 1995.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 31 March 1995.
For the Council The President F. BAYROU
ANNEX
>TABLE>
